eu.europa.esig.dss.client.tsp

Class OnlineTSPSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.esig.dss.client.tsp.OnlineTSPSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TSPSource, Serializable

    public class OnlineTSPSource
extends Object
implements TSPSource
    Class encompassing a RFC 3161 TSA, accessed through HTTP(S) to a given URI
